Key Match Events: Josh Inglis scored a career-best ODI knock of 58 from 59 balls
Mitchell Marsh took 52 runs from 51 balls
Adam Zampa took four wickets in the match
Pat Cummins took two wickets in the match
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa expressed that he could be doing better but felt good about the result
Sri Lanka has now lost its first three matches, facing an uphill battle to make it past the pool stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Maxwell came on for a furious cameo late in the innings
Some wild wind in Lucknow delayed the start of the second innings
